channel.title: Comments on: Sony PSP, Can It Do VOIP?

item.title: By: Skype on PS Vita, Seven Years Late | Joseph Scott

item.description: [...] using a Sony PSP back in April 2005 I wrote Sony PSP, Can It Do VOIP?. I specifically suggested Skype support: So VOIP on a PSP. Hmmmm, what would sort of software [...]
